tender.title: Pension Administration Services
tender.description: TII has a requirement for a pension administration service provider to provide a full, efficient and proactive pension administration and associated advisory services. The administration services must be delivered in a manner that ensures that the operation and administration of TII current pension schemes are in full compliance with: o The Trust Deed and Rules o Pensions and other relevant legislation (as part of the tender submission TII requires a listing of all legislative and best practice requirements for the successful administration of the pension schemes) o The Pensions Authority guidelines o The Pensions Ombudsman o Revenue Commissioners, and o Industry best practice.
